definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
a binomial coefficient (math.)/the number of combinations

sentences.english: The probability of available equipment in production systems is usually referred to the binominal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 在生产系统中，设备作业的概率服从于二项式分布。

sentences.english: It is the only way to keep normal approximation to the binomial.
sentences.chinese: 这是唯一一种保持对于该二项式的正态近似的方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, some combinatorial identities are proved based on binomial generating function.
sentences.chinese: 以二项式作为生成函数，给出了几个组合恒等式证明。

sentences.english: How do I designate a negative binomial error distribution in a GLM using R?
sentences.chinese: 我如何指定在GLM使用负二项式误差分布？

sentences.english: In this paper, we derive some combinatorial inequalities from the property of binomial coefficients.
sentences.chinese: 本文从二项式系数的性质得到了一些组合不等式。

sentences.english: The application of binomial tree model in enterprise R&D investment decision.
sentences.chinese: 二项式模型在企业R&D投资决策中的应用。

sentences.english: Therefore, matrix representation of the binomial coefficients is meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 所以，二项式系数的矩阵表示是有意义的。

sentences.english: Returns the individual term binomial distribution probability.
sentences.chinese: 返回一元二项式分布的概率值。

sentences.english: Even scientists are bound by this practice, insisting on Latin binomials for species.
sentences.chinese: 就连科学家也是如引，坚持用拉丁二项式来命名。

definition: a binomial coefficient (math.)/the number of combinations
surd (math.)/algebraic expression involving a square root or other irrationality
